archimate:BusinessObject.name: VPNTopologyServiceSpecRole
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This class defines the specific type of topology that is required to implement a particular CustomerFacingVPNService in terms of ResourceFacingServiceSpecRoles. Thus, it represents all of the invariant characteristics necessary to build a VPNTopologyService, abstracted in terms of ServiceSpecificationRoles.
Please see the DEN-ng MPLS VPN model for more details.
